stk.ga.ga_tools module¶

Defines the GATools.

class stk.ga.ga_tools.GATools(selection, crossover, mutation, normalization, fitness, exit_, ga_input)¶

Bases: object

Stores objects which carry out GA operations on populations.

selection¶

The Selection instance which performs selections of a population’s members.

Type:Selection
crossover¶

The Crossover instance which crosses a population’s members.

Type:Crossover
mutation¶

The Mutation instance which mutates a population’s members

Type:Mutation
normalization¶

A Normalization instance which rescales or normalizes the fitness values in the population.

Type:Normalization
fitness¶

Holds the name and arguments of the function in fitness to be used for calculating the fitness of MacroMolecule instances in the population.

Alternatively, it can be a function which takes 1 argument: the molecule whose fitness is to be calculated.

Type:FunctionData, function
exit¶

An Exit object which checks if the population satisfied the exit criterion to stop the GA early.

Type:Exit
input¶

The GAInput object holding data gathered from the input file.

Type:GAInput
crossover
exit
fitness
classmethod init_empty()¶

Initializer which sets all attributes to None.

input
mutation
normalization
selection
